timeline.bodyText: What about a from factory method on ExplainabilityRequest that accepts the whole ExplainabilityRequestDto so that it will be easier to evolve in the future?

timeline.bodyText:
Can you please apply these changes?

refactor this class to have both incoming and outgoing events
add a callback parameter to processExplainability method
create a -kafka module with reactive messaging part and another -rest module with the same processExplainability method exposed as REST
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: Hi @danielezonca, I'm done but I did not use a callback. Let me know what do you think
replies.author: r00ta

timeline.message: refactoring modules with messaging and rest

timeline.bodyText: I don't like mixed injection: can you please inject only fields or make all the injection done at constructor level?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Is there any reason why here is CompletableStage while all the other methods are using CompletableFuture?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: The smallrye Message message.ack() returns a CompletionStage, actually it makes sense that we also return CompletionStage in the library and in the other methods. I've changed it accordingly
replies.author: r00ta

replies.bodyText: Please make it disable by default
